node.title: Costly tests may deter Canadians from making quick trips to the U.S.
node.description: Canada requires travelers to present the results of an expensive Covid test to enter, deterring short hops across the border.

node.title: Plan to tackle rising demand for dementia support on cards
node.description: About 70,000 New Zealanders have dementia, but that number is expected to grow to about 170,000 within the next 30 years.

node.title: COVID-19 is biggest cop killer, yet many cops resist vaccines

node.title: Protesters Rally in Fight Against Los Angeles Vaccine Mandate for First Responders

node.title: Missing Girl Is Rescued After Using Hand Signal From TikTok

node.description: The 71-year-old woman and her 1-year-old grandchild did not sustain any serious injuries.

node.title: Want a Child Tax Credit payment in 2021? There's still a chance
